Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/70th
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump and 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jeffery/70th, due to street blockage near Jeffery/70th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jeffery/70th, due to street blockage near Jeffery/70th.

#J14 Jeffery Jump buses will operate via Jeffery, 75th, Stoney Island, 67th, Jeffery and over regular route.

#15 Jeffery Local buses will operate via Jeffery, 75th, Stoney Island, 67th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
